attributes.action: Honour Martin Lewis, Mike Thomas, Barrie Segal & Neil Heron
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: These people are on the citizens side. Martin Lewis of Moneysavingexpert.com hunts down bargains & offers for the consumer. Mike Thomas of Debtwizard.com helps people who are in financial difficulty due to the banking system & companies "throwing" credit at people with no regard as to how they will pay it back. Barrie Segal of Appealnow.com  & Niel Heron of parkingappeals.co.uk help the motorist fight back against the over zealous parking attendants & councils who wrongly issue parking fines

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
